com.hiddenswitch.spellsource

Interface Connection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.vertx.core.Closeable, io.vertx.core.streams.ReadStream<com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.client.models.Envelope>, io.vertx.core.streams.StreamBase, io.vertx.core.streams.WriteStream<com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.client.models.Envelope>

    public interface Connection
extends io.vertx.core.streams.ReadStream<com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.client.models.Envelope>, io.vertx.core.streams.WriteStream<com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.client.models.Envelope>, io.vertx.core.Closeable
    Manages the real time data connection users get when they connect to the Spellsource server.

        static io.vertx.core.streams.WriteStream<com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.client.models.Envelope> writeStream(java.lang.String userId)
                                                                                                   throws com.github.fromage.quasi.fibers.SuspendExecution
        Retrieves a valid reference to write to a connection from anywhere, as long as the event bus on the other node is shared/clustered with this one.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user ID whose connection should be retrieved
        Returns:
        A connection object.
        Throws:
        com.github.fromage.quasi.fibers.SuspendExecution
